protein.general_function: Involved in heat shock protein binding
protein.specific_function: Co-chaperone that binds to numerous kinases and promotes their interaction with the Hsp90 complex, resulting in stabilization and promotion of their activity

reference.reference_text: Stepanova L, Leng X, Parker SB, Harper JW: Mammalian p50Cdc37 is a protein kinase-targeting subunit of Hsp90 that binds and stabilizes Cdk4. Genes Dev. 1996 Jun 15;10(12):1491-502.
